PRAYER: Writ Petition filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of India for
issuance of Writ of Mandamus, directing the respondent to pay arrears of
wages to the petitioner, together with 18% interest per annum after correctly
arriving at the monthly wages payable to him for period from 01.01.2019 to
23.03.2019 by taking note of the enhanced rate of dearness allowance as
ordered/fixed for the period from 01.01.2019 to 30.06.2019 in the G.O.Ms.No.
151, Finance (Allowances) department dated 20.5.2019 and also to revise his
terminal benefits, namely gratuity and encashment of 166 earned leaves,
based on such wages payable to him on the month of his retirement i.e. March
2019 and accordingly to pay him balance/arrears of gratuity and encashment
of earned leave days together with 18% interest per annum, within a time
frame as may be fixed by this Court.
